encounter: Strange a shattered, waterlogged compass lie scattered, painting a tale of dolphin companions that harvesting pearls from giant clams.
You come across a shattered and toppled stone archway of an old campsite, the scent of the pungent smell of a skunk in the distance still lingering.

The whisper of rattling of pebbles in the surf is accompanied by the distinct aroma of scent of salted fish drying on racks. It seems underwater miners are involved in creating storms to deter sailors.

A pack of snow leopards hunting in the rocky terrain gives you a quest to help a clan of mountain creatures negotiate a truce with a rival group.In your path lies a collection of mysterious fossils surrounded by a field of cotton plants with fluffy bolls at high altitudes.
